title: Mott St Ssam Sauce
directions: Mix shallot, jalapeño, doenjang, and gochujang in a small bowl, adding water as needed to thin sauce (aim for the consistency of blue cheese dressing).
DO AHEAD: Sauce can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
ingredients: ⅔ cup cup doenjang or red miso (fermented soybean paste)
⅓ cup gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste)
